attributes.action: Introduce the Tennants right to buy Housing Association Homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most houses rented out to poor hard working people like me belong to Housing Associations. Unfortunately most Housing associations don't give the tennant Right to Buy his or her rented property, which means most poor people will never get on to the property ladder. Why not not give housing association tennants(Millions of them) the same right to buy as that enjoyed by coucil tennants?
